text: "Come Undone" is a 2003 song by Robbie Williams and is the second single from his fifth studio album Escapology (2002). It went to the top 20 in Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Italy, the Netherlands, Romania, Scotland and the United Kingdom. It also went to number 25 in New Zealand and number 27 in Australia. == Track listings == UK CD single # "Come Undone" – 4:34 # "One Fine Day" – 3:36 # "Happy Easter (War Is Coming)" – 4:03 # Photo gallery # Robbie video clips UK cassette single # "Come Undone" # "One Fine Day" # "Happy Easter (War Is Coming)" European CD single # "Come Undone" – 3:34 # "One Fine Day" – 3:36 UK DVD single # "Come Undone" (video) – 4:34 # "One Fine Day" (audio) – 3:36 # "Happy Easter (War Is Coming)" (audio) – 4:03 # Robbie photo gallery # Robbie live video clip == References == Category:2003 songs Category:Robbie Williams songs
title: Come Undone (Robbie Williams song)
